lead_paragraph: The fall in Shaanxi Province appeared to be the deadliest traffic accident in nine months in the nation.

headline.print_headline: World Briefing | Asia; China: Bus Topples Off Steep Hillside in Rural Northwest, Killing at Least 35
headline.main: Bus Goes Over Hillside in China, Killing at Least 35

snippet: The fall in Shaanxi Province appeared to be the deadliest traffic accident in nine months in the nation.
abstract: Tour bus falls off steep hillside in Shaanxi Province in northwest China, killing at least 35 of the around 46 people on board.
